Plot: The diagnosis for Poppy was death. there was no hope--until James, her best friend and secret love, appeared in the hospital. But this was a James she didn't know. He offered Poppy eternal life. Only he could open the door to the Night World. They're soulmates--but can she follow him into death and beyond?
Characters: Thea Sophia Harman, Poppy North, Ash Redfern, James Rasmussen, Blaise Harman, Thierry Descouedres, Phillip North, Cliff Hilgard, Jasper R. Rasmussen, Owen Franklin
